attributes.action: Cap the landfill in Silverdale. Newcastle-under -Lyme
attributes.additional_details: It is making our live hell. Smells daily are 7 on the scale people are worried it messing with there health. We can’t open windows, it’s such a eye sore for many many people. And nothing is been done
attributes.background: We want drastic action on the landfill we are dealing with in Newcastle under Lyme from the landfill owned by red industries.

rejection.details:
Decisions about local waste management, and taking action in relation to private landfills, is a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council directly. Find out how to petition your council here: https://www.newcastle-staffs.gov.uk/all-services/your-council/e-petitions
